text: Kimberly Kaye Wyatt (born February 4, 1982) is an American showgirl, singer- songwriter, dancer, model, actress and choreographer. She is probably best known for being in the Pussycat Dolls. She joined the Pussycat Dolls in 2003. In 2010, she said that she left the group, and made a new band called Her Majesty & The Wolves. title: Kimberly Wyatt
